      • endGame

        public void endGame(IPlayer winner)
             throws RemoteException,
                    InterruptedException
        Will be called when the last level is played. After calling the victory screen will be shown.
        Parameters:
        winner - the player that wins the game by entering the last door.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException

      • pickGhostSpawnPoint

        public Point2D pickGhostSpawnPoint(boolean startOfGame)
        Picks a ghost spawnpoint. The Ghosts spawn in any corner.
        Parameters:
        startOfGame - boolean if the spawnpoint is for the start of the game.
        Returns:
        the ghost spawn point.
